010package Fourier_Shape_Descriptors;
011
012import java.awt.Color;
013import java.awt.Font;
014import java.awt.geom.AffineTransform;
015import java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D;
016import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
017import java.util.List;
018import java.util.Locale;
019
020import ij.IJ;
021import ij.ImagePlus;
022import ij.ImageStack;
023import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
024import ij.gui.Overlay;
025import ij.gui.Roi;
026import ij.gui.ShapeRoi;
027import ij.gui.TextRoi;
028import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
029import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
030import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
031import imagingbook.common.color.iterate.CssColorSequencer;
032import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
033import imagingbook.common.geometry.fd.FourierDescriptor;
034import imagingbook.common.geometry.fd.FourierDescriptorUniform;
035import imagingbook.common.geometry.fd.PolygonSampler;
036import imagingbook.common.math.Complex;
037import imagingbook.common.regions.BinaryRegion;
038import imagingbook.common.regions.Contour;
039import imagingbook.common.regions.RegionContourSegmentation;
040
041/**
042 * @version 2020/04/01
043 * @author WB
044 *
045 */
046@Deprecated
047public class Private_Ellipse_Superposition_AnimationStack implements PlugInFilter {
048
049        static int StepsPerFullRevolution = 500;
050        static int StepsPerSecond = 10;
051
052//      static String PostFix = "a";
053        static int NumberOfContourSamples = 125;
054        static int NumberOfFourierDescriptorPairs = 2;
055
056        static boolean ShowPathPosition = true;
057        static boolean ShowOriginalContour = true;
058        static boolean ShowContourSamples = false;
059        static boolean MarkContourCentroid = true;
060
061
062        static Color    SampleColor = new Color(255, 0, 200);   // Colors.Magenta;
063        static double   SampleStrokeWidth = 1.0;
064        static double   SampleRadius = 2.5; //1.5;
065
066        static Color    ContourColor = new Color(0, 60, 255);   // Colors.Blue;
067        static double   ContourStrokeWidth = 0.25;
068
069        static double   ReconstructionRadius = 1.0;
070        static Color    ReconstructionColor = new Color(0, 185, 15);    // Colors.Green;
071        static double   ReconstructionStrokeWidth = 0.5; //0.75;
072
073        //static Font font = new Font("Serif", Font.PLAIN, 10);
074        static Font font = new Font(Font.MONOSPACED, Font.PLAIN, 10);
075        
076        static boolean AntialiasGraphics = true;
077
078        static AffineTransform PixelShift = new AffineTransform(1, 0, 0, 1, 0.5, 0.5);  // shift by (0.5,0.5) to move to pixel centers
079
080        ImagePlus origImage = null;
081        String origTitle = null;
082        static boolean verbose = true;
083
084        @Override
085        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) { 
086                origImage = im;
087                origTitle = im.getShortTitle();
088                //RegionLabeling.setVerbose(verbose);
089                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES;
090        }
091
092        @Override
093        public void run(ImageProcessor ip1) {
094                int W = ip1.getWidth();
095                int H = ip1.getHeight();
096                
097                double imgScale = Math.sqrt(W*W + H*H) / Math.sqrt(200*200);    // relate image to "standard" size
098                ContourStrokeWidth = ContourStrokeWidth * imgScale;
099                SampleStrokeWidth = SampleStrokeWidth * imgScale;
100                ReconstructionStrokeWidth = ReconstructionStrokeWidth * imgScale;
101                ReconstructionRadius = ReconstructionRadius * imgScale;
102                
103                GenericDialog dlg = new GenericDialog("Fourier Shape Composition Parameters");
104                dlg.addMessage("Fourier decomosition parameters");
105                dlg.addNumericField("Number contour samples", NumberOfContourSamples, 0);
106                dlg.addNumericField("Number of FD pairs (min. 1)", NumberOfFourierDescriptorPairs, 0);
107                dlg.addMessage("Animation parameters");
108                dlg.addNumericField("Angular steps per revolution", StepsPerFullRevolution, 0);
109                dlg.addNumericField("Steps per second", StepsPerSecond, 0);
110                dlg.addMessage("Drawing parameters");
111                dlg.addNumericField("Reconstruction point radius", ReconstructionRadius, 1);
112                dlg.addCheckbox("Anti-alias graphics", AntialiasGraphics);
113                dlg.addMessage("Press ESC or close window to stop animation.");
114                dlg.showDialog();
115                if(dlg.wasCanceled()) return;
116                NumberOfContourSamples = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
117                NumberOfFourierDescriptorPairs = Math.max(1, (int) dlg.getNextNumber());
118                StepsPerFullRevolution = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
119                StepsPerSecond = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
120                ReconstructionRadius = dlg.getNextNumber();
121                AntialiasGraphics = dlg.getNextBoolean();
122                dlg.addMessage("Press ESC or close window to stop animation.");
123
124                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
125
126                ByteProcessor ip = (ByteProcessor) ip1.duplicate();
127
128                //  label regions and trace contours
129                RegionContourSegmentation tracer = new RegionContourSegmentation(ip);
130                //IJ.log("tracing done");
131
132                // extract contours and regions
133                List<? extends Contour> outerContours = tracer.getOuterContours(true);
134                if (outerContours.isEmpty()) {
135                        IJ.error("no regions found");
136                        return;
137                }
138
139                Contour contr = outerContours.get(0);   // contour of largest region
140                Pnt2d[] polygon = PolygonSampler.getInstance().samplePolygon(contr.getPointArray(), NumberOfContourSamples);
141                Complex[] samples = FourierDescriptor.toComplexArray(polygon);
142                
143                FourierDescriptor fd = FourierDescriptorUniform.from(polygon);
144//              FourierDescriptor fd = new FourierDescriptorUniform(polygon);
145                //fd.print();
146
147                String title = origTitle + String.format("-coeff%03d",NumberOfFourierDescriptorPairs);
148                ImagePlus im = new ImagePlus(title, ip);
149                if (ip.isInvertedLut()) {
150                        ip.invert();
151                        ip.invertLut();
152                }
153                brighten(ip, 220);
154                im.show();
155
156                long frameTimeMs = Math.round(1000.0/StepsPerSecond);
157
158                ImageStack stack = new ImageStack(ip.getWidth(), ip.getHeight());
159
160                for (int k = 0; k < StepsPerFullRevolution; k++) {
161
162                        if (IJ.escapePressed() || im.getWindow() == null || im.getWindow().isClosed()) {
163                                break;
164                        }
165
166                        double t = (double) k / StepsPerFullRevolution;
167                        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
168                        Overlay oly = new Overlay();
169                        
170                        String timeString = String.format(Locale.US, "t=%.4f", t);
171
172                        if (ShowPathPosition) {
173                                TextRoi troi = new TextRoi(5, 0, timeString, font);
174                                troi.setStrokeColor(Color.black);
175                                oly.add(troi);
176                        }
177
178                        if (ShowOriginalContour) { // draw the original contour ------------------------------------
179                                oly.add(makeCentroidShape(contr));
180                        }
181
182                        if (ShowContourSamples) { // draw the contour sample points ------------------------------
183                                drawSamples(oly, samples, 0.5, 0.5);
184                        }
185
186                        if (MarkContourCentroid) { // mark the center ---------------------------------------------
187                                oly.add(makeCentroidShape(fd));
188                        }
189
190                        // --------------------------------------------------------------
191
192                        { // draw the reconstructed shape from FD-pairs 0,...,mMax -------
193                                int mMax = NumberOfFourierDescriptorPairs;
194//                              Path2D path = fd.makeFourierPairsReconstructionPartial(mMax);
195                                Path2D path = FourierDescriptor.toPath(fd.getShapePartial(50, mMax));
196                                path.transform(PixelShift);
197                                ShapeRoi roi = new ShapeRoi(path);
198                                roi.setStrokeColor(ReconstructionColor);
199                                roi.setStrokeWidth(ReconstructionStrokeWidth);
200                                oly.add(roi);
201                        }
202
203                        //  draw superposition of ellipses ----------------------
204
205                        Complex cc = fd.getCoefficient(0);      // current ellipse center
206                        int mMax = NumberOfFourierDescriptorPairs;
207                        //                      RandomColorGenerator rcg = new RandomColorGenerator(1);
208
209                        CssColorSequencer csq = new CssColorSequencer();
210                        for (int m = 1; m <= mMax; m++) {
211                                //IJ.log("drawing ellipse " + m);
212                                //                              Color color = rcg.nextColor(); //makeRandomColor();
213                                Color color = csq.next();
214//                              Complex c1 = fd.getCoefficient(-m);
215//                              Complex c2 = fd.getCoefficient(m);
216                                
217//                              Path2D path = fd.makeEllipse(c1, c2, m, cc.re + 0.5, cc.im + 0.5);
218//                              Path2D path = fd.getPathPair(m, cc.re + 0.5, cc.im + 0.5);
219                                Path2D path = FourierDescriptor.toPath(fd.getShapePair(50, m));
220                                path.transform(AffineTransform.getTranslateInstance(cc.re + 0.5, cc.im + 0.5)); // move to current center cc
221                                
222                                ShapeRoi rpoly = new ShapeRoi(path);
223                                rpoly.setStrokeColor(color);
224                                rpoly.setStrokeWidth(ReconstructionStrokeWidth/2);
225                                oly.add(rpoly);
226
227                                // mark the path position for t
228                                Complex c12 = fd.getShapePointPair(m, t);
229//                              Complex c12 = fd.getEllipsePoint(c1, c2, m, t);
230                                //IJ.log("re: " + c12.re + " im: " + c12.im);
231                                double rad = ReconstructionRadius;
232                                Ellipse2D oval =  // mark te current point by a small circle
233                                                new Ellipse2D.Double(c12.re + cc.re - rad + 0.5, c12.im + cc.im - rad + 0.5, 2 * rad, 2 * rad);
234                                Roi roi = new ShapeRoi(oval);
235                                roi.setFillColor(color);
236                                //roi.setStrokeWidth(ReconstructionStrokeWidth/2);
237                                oly.add(roi);
238                                cc = cc.add(c12);
239                        }
240
241                        im.setOverlay(oly);
242                        im.setAntialiasRendering(AntialiasGraphics);
243                        //im.updateAndDraw();
244                        
245                        IJ.wait(10);
246                        ImagePlus imFlat = im.flatten();
247                        IJ.wait(10);
248                        
249                        stack.addSlice(timeString, imFlat.getProcessor());
250
251                        long elapsedTime = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
252                        int remainingTime = (int) (frameTimeMs - elapsedTime);
253
254                        if (remainingTime > 0) {
255                                //IJ.log("waiting " + remainingTime);
256                                //IJ.wait(remainingTime);
257                        }
258                }
259                
260                (new ImagePlus(title, stack)).show();
261
262        }
263
264
265
266        void drawSamples(Overlay oly, Complex[] samples, double dx, double dy) {
267                double rad = SampleRadius;
268                for (Complex c : samples) {
269                        Ellipse2D oval = new Ellipse2D.Double(c.re + dx - rad, c.im + dy - rad, 2 * rad, 2 * rad);
270                        Roi roi = new ShapeRoi(oval);
271                        roi.setFillColor(SampleColor);
272                        roi.setStrokeColor(SampleColor);
273                        roi.setStrokeWidth(SampleStrokeWidth);
274                        oly.add(roi);
275                }
276        }
277
278        void printRegions(List<BinaryRegion> regions) {
279                for (BinaryRegion r: regions) {
280                        IJ.log("" + r);
281                }
282        }
283
284        void brighten(ByteProcessor ip, int minGray) {
285                float scale = (255 - minGray) / 255f;
286                int[] table = new int[256];
287                for (int i=0; i<256; i++) {
288                        table[i] = Math.round(minGray + scale * i);
289
290                }
291                ip.applyTable(table);
292        }
293
294        void darken(ByteProcessor ip, int maxGray) {
295                float scale = maxGray / 255f;
296                int[] table = new int[256];
297                for (int i=0; i<256; i++) {
298                        table[i] = Math.round(scale * i);
299
300                }
301                ip.applyTable(table);
302        }
303
304        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
305
306        ShapeRoi makeCentroidShape(FourierDescriptor fd) { 
307                int crossSize = 2;
308                Complex G0 = fd.getCoefficient(0);
309                double xc = G0.re;
310                double yc = G0.im;
311                Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
312                path.moveTo(xc-crossSize, yc);
313                path.lineTo(xc+crossSize, yc);
314                path.moveTo(xc, yc-crossSize);
315                path.lineTo(xc, yc+crossSize);
316                path.transform(PixelShift);
317                ShapeRoi roi = new ShapeRoi(path);
318                roi.setStrokeColor(ReconstructionColor);
319                roi.setStrokeWidth(ReconstructionStrokeWidth);
320                return roi;
321        }
322
323        ShapeRoi makeCentroidShape(Contour contr) { // draw the original contour ------------------------------------
324                Path2D path = contr.getPolygonPath(0.5, 0.5);
325                path.transform(PixelShift);
326                ShapeRoi roi = new ShapeRoi(path);
327                roi.setStrokeColor(ContourColor);
328                roi.setStrokeWidth(ContourStrokeWidth);
329                return roi;
330        }
331
